column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Tenzin says : " It 's like a dream , Dad .
#Text=When that new guy 's airbending , does that make him our brother ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Well , in a way , all airbenders are our family .
#Text=" Ikki says : " Does that mean I have to share my room ?
#Text=Because I like my personal space .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Of course not .
#Text=But we might have to get used to not being the only airbenders around anymore .
#Text=" Meelo says : " I hope we have enough for an army .
#Text=I want to be Commander like Uncle Bumi .
#Text=" Jinora says : " Air Nomads do n't have armies , Meelo .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " But maybe , there will be enough to fill the temples again .
#Text=" Jinora says : " What 's wrong , Daddy ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I just wish your grandfather was here to see this .
#Text=" Meelo says : " Will you be airbender President ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " No , but I think the new airbenders will need lots of help and guidance to understand what it means to be part of our nation .
#Text=That 's a big responsibility .
#Text=" Meelo says : " Do n't worry dad , we 'll help you .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I know you will .
#Text="
